results.name: Number of distinct prime factors of n*rad(n)+1, where rad=A007947 (squarefree kernel).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: A078313[n_] := PrimeNu[n*Times @@ FactorInteger[n][[All, 1]] + 1]; Array[A078313, 50] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 25 2017 *)
